name: Concentration (itch)
description:
Concentration is a game prototype made for the Berlin Mini Game Jam in April 2017. It's a personal game about having AD/HD inattentive type.

Your job is to concentrate to the end of a meeting while picking up five pieces of information, in order. Unfortunately you can't always get from one piece of information to the next in a direct route. Your thoughts just won't cooperate! Keep hopping from one thought to the next and hope you can make it through the meeting.

This is a very early prototype; I have a lot of ideas for further development of Concentration. With a bit of luck I will be able to keep working on it and not just forget I started it!
